title: Greek green bean salad
ingredients: ['500g green beans (fresh or frozen)', '3 tomatoes, diced', '2 tablespoons white balsamic vinegar', '4 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper', '1 to 2 shallots, minced', '1 small garlic clove, minced', '1 small handful fresh parsley, minced', '50g feta cheese, crumbled']
